Russian Federation recognized extremist and prohibited organizations: FBK (Criminal Anti-Corruption Foundation, Foreign Agent), Naval State, National Bolshevist Party, Jehovah ' s Witnesses, People ' s Army, Rous National Union, Movement Against Illegal Immigration, UNA-UNSO Terrorists have been recognized and banned: Taliban, Imarat Caucasus, Islamic State (IG, ISIL), Jebhad al-Nusra, AUM Sinrike, Buriy Muslim, Al-Qaida in Islamic Maghreb, Seth, Koloumbain. The Russian Federation recognizes the undesirable activities of the Open Russia, the Media Project. The media agents are recognized as " Maj " , " Meduza " , " Important Histories " , " Liberty " , The Insider, " Mediazon " , UDD-info. The foreign agents have been recognized by the Society/Memorial Centre, the Yuri Levada Analytical Centre, the Sahara Centre.Instagram and Facebook (Meta) are prohibited in the Russian Federation for extremism.
